00049 void ArrayDataTest::testproperty_Properties()
00050 {
00051         string id = "file_id";
00052         ArrayData array;
00053         array.ArraySetFileIdentifier() = id;
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == id);
00055 
00056         array.DataTypeIdentifier() = "affymetrix-calvin-arraysetfile";
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.DataTypeIdentifier() == "affymetrix-calvin-arraysetfile");
00058         array.CreatedStep() = ArrayRegistrationStep;
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.CreatedStep() == ArrayRegistrationStep);
00060         array.InitialProject() = L"none";
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.InitialProject() == L"none");
00062         array.CreationDateTime() = L"now";
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.CreationDateTime() == L"now");
00064         array.CreatedBy() = L"me";
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.CreatedBy() == L"me");
00066 }
00067 
00068 void ArrayDataTest::testmethod_Clear()
00069 {
00070         string id = "file_id";
00071         ArrayData array;
00072         array.ArraySetFileIdentifier() = id;
00073         array.PhysicalArraysAttributes().resize(2);
00074         array.UserAttributes().resize(4);
00075         array.DataTypeIdentifier() = "affymetrix-calvin-arraysetfile";
00076         array.CreatedStep() = ArrayRegistrationStep;
00077         array.InitialProject() = L"none";
00078         array.CreationDateTime() = L"now";
00079         array.CreatedBy() = L"me";
00080         array.Clear();
00081 
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == "");
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 0);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.UserAttributes().size() == 0);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.DataTypeIdentifier() == "");
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.CreatedStep() == NoStep);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.InitialProject() == L"");
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.CreationDateTime() == L"");
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array.CreatedBy() == L"");
00090 }

00092 void ArrayDataTest::testproperty_PhysicalArraysAttributes()
00093 {
00094         ArrayData array;
00095         array.PhysicalArraysAttributes().resize(1);
00096         array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() = "array1-id";
00097         ParameterNameValuePairVector &params = array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes();
00098         ParameterNameValuePair param;
00099 
00100         param.Name = L"array-att-name-1";
00101         param.Value = L"array-att-value-1";
00102         params.push_back(param);
00103 
00104         param.Name = L"array-att-name-2";
00105         param.Value = L"array-att-value-2";
00106         params.push_back(param);
00107 
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( params.size() == 2 );
00109 
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1 );
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() == "array1-id");
00112 
00113         ParameterNameValuePairVector::iterator it = array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes().begin();
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).Name == L"array-att-name-1" );
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).Value == L"array-att-value-1" );
00116         ++it;
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).Name == L"array-att-name-2" );
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).Value == L"array-att-value-2" );
00119         ++it;
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (it == array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes().end() );
00121 
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[0].Name == L"array-att-name-1" );
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[0].Value == L"array-att-value-1" );
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[1].Name == L"array-att-name-2" );
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[1].Value == L"array-att-value-2" );
00126 }
00127 
00128 void ArrayDataTest::testproperty_UserAttributes()
00129 {
00130 
00131         ArrayData array;
00132         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &params = array.UserAttributes();
00133         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType vparam;
00134 
00135         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-1");
00136         vparam.SetValueAscii("user-att-value-1");
00137         vparam.SetDefaultValueAscii("user-att-defaultvalue-1");
00138         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00139         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear() ;
00140         params.push_back(vparam);
00141 
00142         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-2");
00143         vparam.SetValueText(L"user-att-value-2");
00144         vparam.SetDefaultValueText(L"user-att-defaultvalue-2");
00145         vparam.RequiredFlag() = true;
00146         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear()  ;
00147         params.push_back(vparam);
00148 
00149         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-3");
00150         vparam.SetValueText(L"user-att-value-3");
00151         vparam.SetDefaultValueText(L"user-att-defaultvalue-3");
00152         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00153         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"control1");
00154         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"control2");
00155         params.push_back(vparam);
00156 
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.UserAttributes().size() == 3 );
00158 
00159         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator it = array.UserAttributes().begin();
00160 
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetName() == L"user-att-name-1" );
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetValueAscii() == "user-att-value-1" );
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetDefaultValueAscii() == "user-att-defaultvalue-1" );
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).RequiredFlag() == false);
00166         ++it;
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetName() == L"user-att-name-2" );
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetValueText() == L"user-att-value-2" );
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetDefaultValueText() == L"user-att-defaultvalue-2" );
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).RequiredFlag() == true);
00172         ++it;
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetName() == L"user-att-name-3" );
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetValueText() == L"user-att-value-3" );
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetDefaultValueText() == L"user-att-defaultvalue-3" );
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 2 );
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).RequiredFlag() == false);
00178 
00179         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator controllIt = (*it).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*controllIt) == L"control1" );
00181         ++controllIt;
00182         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*controllIt) == L"control2" );
00183         ++it;
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (it == array.UserAttributes().end() );
00185 
00186 }
